title: Chris Rock In Talks To Host The 2016 Oscars
text:
Chris Rock In Talks To Host The 2016 Oscars 
Published By: CinemaBlend.com - Today 
At this point, it's more than a little surprising that anybody would be interested in hosting the Oscars. While it's the biggest night for a...
